name: Oatmeal
description:
This chunky knitted cowl is perfect for a nice cold winter day, created with washer friendly wool blend yarn (measures 13 inches tall and 14 inches wide). The black and off-brown speckles allow you to wear this cowl with a black or brown toned jacket. 

Oatmeal can be worn by both men and women.  

I recommend handwashing item in cold water and laying it flat on a towel to dry. 

Shipping cost will be estimated by PayPal at checkout.

name: Baby Oat
description:
This chunky knitted cowl is perfect for a nice cold winter day, created with washer friendly wool blend yarn ( measures 8.5 inches tall and 11 inches wide). The black and off-brown speckles allow you to wear this cowl with a black or brown toned jacket. 

Baby Oat can be worn by both men and women.  

I recommend handwashing item in cold water and laying it flat on a towel to dry. 

Shipping cost will be estimated by PayPal at checkout.

name: Green Twist
description:
Green Twist is a short cowl crocheted in a soft wool blend yarn. This piece is functional and doubles as a necklace over a dress or sweater. Take a simple dress and add a fresh Green Twist to make heads turn. 

I recommend handwashing item in cold water and laying it flat on a towel to dry.  

Shipping cost will be estimated by PayPal at checkout.

name: The Comfy Scarf
description:
This is a great statement item on a nice fall day. Wear it over your favorite sweater or rock it with a coat for ultimate warmth. This scarf was inspired by the cold winter months I spent in Boston, MA. 

Washer-machine friendly, chunky-style yarn was used for this creation, which is 7 inches in width and 6 feet long. You can wrap it twice around the neck area for full coverage, as you can see demonstrated in the picture.

I recommend handwashing item in cold water and laying it flat on a towel to dry.  

Shipping cost will be estimated by PayPal at checkout.
